dmca.title: Family Directly Stifling Competition?
dmca.body:
This is to put you on notice of copyright and trademark infringement whereby companies are using our company name as a search query in advertising campaigns controlled by Google, Inc.  

       Specifically, Family Direct Insurance Services, Inc. recently became aware that consumers were being misdirected by Google to the website awg2002.nu.ca. This website is registered as a subdomain name of Defining Presence Marketing Group, Inc. by the registrant
